structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Producer or wholesaler not to furnish sign to licensee except under administrative regulations.
law.text: No distiller, rectifier, winery, or wholesaler shall furnish or cause to be furnished to any licensee any exterior or interior sign, printed, painted, electric or otherwise, except as authorized by the administrative regulations of the board.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 89, effective June 25, 2013. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-171.
